channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Tour news: Halsey, Pulp/Hamilton Leithauser, Rilo Kiley, Darkest Hour, MDC, Bay Swag, more
item.description: 🎶 Exciting tour updates! Who's hitting the road? Halsey, Pulp/Hamilton Leithauser, Rilo Kiley, and more ready to rock! 🚌🎸 #MusicNews

item.title: HighSchool Announce Self-titled Debut Album: Hear “Dipped”
item.description: 🎉 HighSchool is serving up some major vibes with their debut album! 🎶 Have you listened to "Dipped" yet? 🔥 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Trans-Siberian Orchestra Announce “The Ghosts of Christmas Eve” 2025 Tour
item.description: 🎄 Get ready to rock around the Christmas tree! Trans-Siberian Orchestra announces their festive 2025 tour - it's going to be jingle bell rockin'! 🎸🔔 #TSO2025Tour

item.title: Win Two Weekend Passes to Riot Fest 2025 with Green Day, blink-182, Weezer, and Jack White
item.description: 🎉 Ready to rock at Riot Fest 2025? Win two weekend passes to see Green Day, blink-182, Weezer, and Jack White! 🤘 #RiotFest2025 #MusicFestivalFun

item.title: Lollapalooza Reveals 2026 South American Lineups with Chappell Roan, Sabrina Carpenter, Lorde & Deftones
item.description: 🎉 Let's samba with Chappell Roan, groove with Sabrina Carpenter, vibe with Lorde, and rock out with Deftones at Lollapalooza 2026 South America! 🎶 #Lolla2026
